TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that blocks DNA synthesis and may prevent tumor cell growth. It is being studied as a treatment for cancer.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "thymidylate synthase inhibitor"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "inhibidor de la timidilata sintasa"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que impide la síntesis del ADN y que podría prevenir el crecimiento de células tumorales. Esta en estudio para el tratamiento de cáncer.
